func.title: Exit

param.name: x
param.desc: Offset of the X exit position.

param.name: y
param.desc: Offset of the Y exit position.

param.name: iR
param.desc: Object rotation on exit in degrees.

param.name: xdir
param.desc: Horizontal exit velocity. This is the actual speed value (with no precision multiplication).

param.name: ydir
param.desc: Vertical exit velocity. This is the actual speed value (with no precision multiplication).

param.name: rdir
param.desc: Rotational speed of the exiting object.

func.desc: Moves an object from its container. Optionally, sets its exit velocity.

example.text: Moves the first contained object from the calling object, rotates it randomly and throws it upwards.
